snippet.title: Battlenauts | Meta Quest | Release Trailer | Mixed Reality Space Strategy Game | 2024
snippet.description:
Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game where you command Earth's starfleet in a race against rival factions to secure a newly discovered anomaly. Battle through 10 single-player campaign missions or test your skills in a 4-player multiplayer, with public and private matches. Unleash special attacks, outsmart rivals, and secure the anomaly to determine your faction’s fate in this fast-paced cosmic struggle. Every move could tip the balance of power!

#popupasylum #battlenauts #metaquest3 #mixedreality #virtualreality #handtracking 

Download now: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/battlenauts/8572045439489044
